column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Can I just tell you this place how much this place blew my mind?!! I came here on a weekday during lunch
column2: but was really looking for one thing in particular--the chocolate chip
column3: walnut cookie. I've seen the photos. I felt it had to be good
column4: and it was; it really was! The cookie had been everything I have dreamt of since 2013 when I went to Levain Bakery in NYC. Since that time
column5: I haven't come across a cookie that good...until now! Thank goodness Houston has blessed us with a cookie exactly like it!
